channel.title: PyScript on Allen's Whiteboard
channel.description: Recent content in PyScript on Allen's Whiteboard

item.title: Write (and Run) Python in Blog
item.description: Trying out PyScript, a new tool that embeds (runnable) Python code inside HTML. Cool huh? Even better, it’s developed and maintained by Anaconda team which makes it sound more promising and trustworthy, at least in the long run. import numpy as np from types import SimpleNamespace import scipy.stats as ss import statsmodels.api as sm import matplotlib.pyplot as plt n = 1000 u = ss.pareto.rvs(1.5, size=n) v = ss.norm.rvs(0, 1, size=n) x = np.
